summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Fusion Labs website with all consolidated features in /fusion-labs/ folder. All major features working correctly including Widget OS page updates, Fusion OS interactive simulator, and firmware updater functionality.

resolved_issues.issue: Missing node_modules causing webpack compilation errors
resolved_issues.resolution: Reinstalled dependencies with yarn install and restarted frontend service

passed_tests: Widget OS page loads with new tagline 'Your Favourite Widgets, Now On Your Wrists'
Kickstarter support section displays with green theme and functional button
Acknowledgments section shows all 6 required entries (LVGL, Espressif, Waveshare, Emergent, Little Sister, Open Source)
Made with love by makers section present and functional
Fusion OS page loads with RPG-themed content
Display Troubleshooting warning banner shows in red with -1000% status
Marketing images section displays 2 anime watch images (Luffy Gear 5, Solo Leveling)
Development status shows Display Troubleshooting at -1000% and Internet Features at 70%
Watch simulator has 3 navigable screens (face, menu, stats) with working navigation dots
Theme switching works correctly with 3 available themes
All firmware files exist and are accessible in /fusion-labs/firmware/ folder structure
Both 1.8" and 2.06" updater pages work with correct board-specific theming
Console output functionality works in firmware updater
